topic: Deep dive: filecmp standard library module in Python 3.12+
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: Deep dive: filecmp standard library module in Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: Deep Dive: Filecmp Standard Library Module in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This explainer delves into the enhanced features and usage of the Filecmp standard library module in Python 3.12+, highlighting its role in comparing files and directories.
key_points: Compares files and directories for equivalence
Supports binary and text file comparison
Implements the 'cmp' function to compare two files directly
version_notes: In Python 3.12+, Filecmp has been updated to provide better compatibility and performance enhancements.
The `filecmp` module can be found in the standard library.
caveats: Be mindful of differences caused by line endings (LF, CRLF, or LF-only) when comparing text files
Binary files might contain differences that are not immediately apparent, such as subtle variations in data representation
